snippet: The Bureau of Prisons has rejected the Army’s request to accept the transfer of Chelsea Manning, formerly known as Pfc. Bradley Manning, from the military prison at Fort Leavenworth, Kan., to a civilian facility.
abstract: Bureau of Prisons rejects Army’s request to accept transfer of Chelsea Manning, formerly known as Pfc Bradley Manning, from military prison at Fort Leavenworth, Kan, to a civilian facility where she could get better treatment for her gender-identity condition; military will instead begin initial treatments for her.
lead_paragraph: The Bureau of Prisons has rejected the Army’s request to accept the transfer of Chelsea Manning, formerly known as Pfc. Bradley Manning, from the military prison at Fort Leavenworth, Kan., to a civilian facility.

headline.main: Manning’s Gender Treatments to Be Begun by the Military
headline.print_headline: Manning’s Gender Treatments to Be Begun by the Military

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
